AI Description: The Weather Research and Forecasting (WRF) model is a next-generation mesoscale numerical weather prediction system designed to serve both atmospheric research and operational forecasting needs. It features multiple options for parameterizations, data assimilation techniques, and model domains, allowing for simulations at various spatial and temporal scales.
Core Features: Mesoscale Numerical Weather Prediction, Parameterizations, Data Assimilation, Model Domains, Simulation At Various Scales
General Tags: Weather Forecasting, Numerical Modeling, Atmospheric Science
